General.Name: Lungyen Life Service
General.Description: Lungyen Life Service Corporation provides funeral services in Taiwan. The company operates through five segments: Columbarium Sales; Funeral Service; Property Lease; Cemetery Operation and Others; and Construction Sales. Its funeral services comprise hospice, memorial service, jinta burial, and follow-up care. The company's facilities include memorial park and columbarium, and light monuments. It is also involved in the development, sale, and rental of residential and commercial buildings; investment business; provision of architecture and civil engineering services; management and operation of cemeteries; and sale of cremated remains storage facilities. The company was formerly known as Da Han Construction. Lungyen Life Service Corporation was incorporated in 1987 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.111, Dongshi Street, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 221
